page.title: 01Landscape
page.content: The landscape is undulating with drainage by the{R.Eau.}It flows{N.W} through a small valley cut in the { {Frodingham Limestone}(and thence into the{R.Trent}).Its tributaries are Dar Beck,Scotton Beck and 4 small drains which join it in this area.The highest ground lies in the{S.W}and along the{N side with elevation up to{27m}above sea level.Seismology surveys have been made recently but there are no oil drillings as yet and no plans have been announced.The population is concentrated in the two villages of {Scotter}(pop.2750) and{Scotton} (pop.469) as well as small family groups in farms scattered throughout the area. Further information can be found in the books{"Scotter - Our Village"}and {"Scotton,Aspects of Village Life".}
